summary: The slide discusses the potential for self-improvement in AI through experiments conducted on NLP benchmarks, specifically focusing on the Bigbench-hard (2023) and BIG-bench benchmarks. These benchmarks include multiple reasoning tasks and are designed to probe and extrapolate the future capabilities of large language models.
